name: Vivid Labs
description: The VID token powers VIVID (formerly VideoCoin Network), the next generation NFT publishing platform. VIVID allows anyone to create, manage, and sell multimedia NFTs, enabling new use cases and business models, and evolving NFTs into complete media experiences. Compatible across all major blockchains, VIVID offers advanced NFT + features that transform simple NFTs into rich media experiences that are multi-format, multi-asset, permissioned, updateable and resilient. Build your NFT business on VIVID at http://VividLabs.com.
